Description: Red granite fragment from a naos (?). Nekhthorheb is shown before Bastet, the scene below (this part of the object now separated) depicts three figures of pharaoh upholding stars. One thickness is also decorated.
Curator's comments: Published: N. Spencer, A Naos of Nekhthorheb from Bubastis (British Museum Research Publications 156, 2006). PM IV,p.30 Naville, Bubastis (1891): 58, pl.XLVII G, G', G'' (G' indicated in wrong position). Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX (1988): 72, 124; pl. LXXXVIIIc-d Erroneously associated with naos EA 1078-80 in Van Siclen, Fs Goedicke: 321-32.
